select t.room_code, t.custroom_type, ( case WHEN t.custroom_type = '01' THEN ( case when #{local,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' then concat(t.hotel_name, ' 酒店 ',t.room_type,' 客房价格低至 ',t.s_room_price,' 元') else concat(t.hotel_name, ' hotel ',t.room_type,' ,the lowest price of ',t.s_room_price) END ) ELSE ( case when #{local,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' then concat(t.hotel_name, ' 酒店 ',t.room_type,' 客房好评不断，人气爆棚') else concat(t.hotel_name, ' hotel ',t.room_type,' is highly praised and popularity is booming' ) END ) END ) remark from (select a.room_code room_code, a.custroom_type custroom_type,
(case when #{local,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' then c.hotel_cname ELSE c.hotel_ename END ) hotel_name,
( select (CASE WHEN #{local,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' THEN w.cn_name ELSE w.en_name END ) from sys_dict z join sys_dict w on z.id = w.parent_id where z.code = 'ROOM_TYPE' and w.code = b.room_type ) room_type, d.s_room_price s_room_price
from biz_recommend_room a LEFT JOIN biz_room b on a.room_code = b.room_code left join biz_hotl c on b.hotel_code = c.hotel_code left join biz_prise d on a.room_code = d.room_code AND d.price_date = date_format(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ) t
